summary: Defines an abstract base class that standardizes the interface for persisting binary objects to cloud storage services, handling common upload logic while delegating providerâ€‘specific details to concrete subclasses.
business_intent: Enable the application to store files across multiple cloud storage platforms through a single, interchangeable client API, improving flexibility, maintainability, and ease of integration with services such as Azure Data Lake, Amazon S3, and Google Cloud Storage.
